thread.title: Prep roundup: Glenbard West tennis fares well at conference before starting postseason
thread.title_full: Prep roundup: Glenbard West tennis fares well at conference before starting postseason

title: Prep roundup: Glenbard West tennis fares well at conference before starting postseason
text:
Prep roundup: Glenbard West tennis fares well at conference before starting postseason Published: Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015 12:58 p.m. CDT By SUBURBAN LIFE MEDIA 
Glenbard West’s girls tennis team had several strong showings at the West Suburban Silver conference tournament it hosted Oct. 9 and 10. 
Caroline Maltby placed third at No. 1 singles, one of four third-place showings the Hilltoppers had at the tourney. 
West’s No. 4 doubles team finished as the runner-up in its bracket. 
The Hilltoppers will compete in the Downers Grove South sectional Oct. 16 and 17. 
BOYS CROSS COUNTRY 
Glenbard South 
Michael King (16th overall, 15:34), Andrew Sundberg (30th, 15:58) and Cristian Hilliard (38th, 16:09) all had strong showings in a field of more than 260 runners at the Metamora invite Oct. 10. 
Joey Wood (54th, 16:29) and Roy Dodge (101st, 17:13) also were scoring runners for South, which placed seventh in the team standings. 
GIRLS CROSS COUNTRY 
Glenbard South 
Courtney Knight (65th overall, 19:49) and Erica Mote (78th, 20:15) were the Raiders’ top finishers at the Metamora invite Oct. 10. Alyssa Flores, Bri Fonseca and Grace Gibson also counted toward the team score for Glenbard South, which placed 16th. 
BOYS SOCCER 
Glenbard South 
Facing crosstown foe Glenbard West on Oct. 10, the Raiders suffered a 4-2 defeat for their sixth straight loss. 
South looks to rebound in the regular-season finale against host Ridgewood on Oct. 15 before starting play in the postseason. The Raiders, who are the No. 10 seed in the Class 2A sectional they host, start the playoffs Oct. 21 against No. 6 Farragut in a regional semifinal at St. Joseph. 
Glenbard West 
The Hilltoppers earned a 4-2 win against Glenbard South on senior day Oct. 10. West closed the regular season with a West Suburban Silver game against Downers Grove North on Oct. 13 before kicking off postseason play against Elk Grove. The Hilltoppers are the No. 16 seed in the Class 3A Wheaton Academy sectional and host the No. 17 Grenadiers at 5:30 p.m. Oct. 16. The winner moves on to face No. 1 seed Schaumburg at 5 p.m. Oct. 21. 
GIRLS VOLLEYBALL 
Glenbard South 
The Raiders earned a 25-9, 25-17 win against Aurora Central Catholic on Oct. 8 before facing Wheaton Academy on Oct. 13.
